DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study Oxaliplatin Navelbine Second-Line Treatment Advanced NSCLC .
DOC.detailed_description: This non-randomized trial patient previously treat Non-small cell lung cancer . Each patient receive 6 cycle chemotherapy consist Oxaliplatin Navelbine . Oxaliplatin give intravenously every 21 day Navelbine administer Intravenously day 1 day 8 every 21 day .
DOC.criteria: Locally advanced metastatic nonsmall cell lung cancer recur , progress , fail respond previous systemic chemo . Measurable disease Good performance status ( ECOG 0,1 2 ) Previously treat Oxaliplatin Navelbine Symptomatic CNS metastasis
